full_text:
"MicroStrategy [..] $900 million aggregate principal amount of 0% convertible senior notes due 2027 [..] The notes will not bear regular interest. [..] MicroStrategy intends to use the net proceeds from the sale of the notes to acquire additional bitcoin."
https://t.co/0TGx1zNT6r

localize.full_text:
"MicroStrategy公司[...]9亿美元本金总额为0%的可转换优先票据于2027年到期[...]这些票据将不定期计息。[...]MicroStrategy打算用出售票据的净收益来收购更多的比特币。"
https://t.co/0TGx1zNT6r

"MicroStrategy公司[...]9億美元本金總額爲0%的可轉換優先票據於2027年到期[...]這些票據將不定期計息。[...]MicroStrategy打算用出售票據的淨收益來收購更多的比特幣。"
